trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_SEQ_00<tab>J'nasshym of the Brugaire Consortium seeks the services of a conveniently unoccupied adventurer.

TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_SEQ_01<tab>J'nasshym of the Brugaire Consortium has tasked you with making a delivery─a gift parcel for services rendered─to the Dutiful Sisters of the Edelweiss. Head to the Sisters' “convent” found near Fisherman's Bottom, and hand the package directly to Lonwoerd.
TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_SEQ_02<tab>You have delivered the package to Lonwoerd. Return to the Octant and speak with J'nasshym.

TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_SEQ_03<tab>You return to J'nasshym and convey Lonwoerd's message. It would seem that the Dutiful Sisters are far more important to the continued well-being of Limsa Lominsa than their modest facade would indicate...
TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the package for the Dutiful Sisters to Lonwoerd.

TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_JNASSHYM_000_000<tab>Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but might you have a moment or two to spare? You seem the type who enjoys being accosted for menial tasks, and I require someone to make a delivery to the Dutiful Sisters of the Edelweiss.
TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_JNASSHYM_000_001<tab>I wouldn't be surprised if you hadn't heard of them─the Sisters prefer not to advertise their presence here in Limsa Lominsa.

TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_JNASSHYM_000_002<tab>They do, however, provide a rather <var 1A 02 /var>unique<var 1A 01 /var> service of which the Brugaire Consortium has recently been the beneficiary. I would have you deliver this package to their doorman, Lonwoerd, along with our profuse gratitude.

TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_JNASSHYM_000_010<tab>You'll find the Dutiful Sisters'...er, “convent” down near Fisherman's Bottom. Pray deliver the package to the doorman, along with the sincere gratitude of the Brugaire Consortium.

TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_LONWOERD_000_020<tab>Aye, this's the Dutiful Sisters o' the Edelweiss─a house o' deep reflection an' meditation. So unless ye've proper business with us, ye can kindly bugger off.
TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_LONWOERD_000_021<tab>Ho there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Ye lookin' to head inside?
TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_LONWOERD_000_022<tab>...What's this, then? A parcel from the Brugaire Consortium, eh? Let's have a peek inside...
TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_LONWOERD_000_023<tab>Oooh, walnut bread an' ginger cookies. ...An' a few o' them Bismarck finger sandwiches, too! Them Consortium culls know the right way to show appreciation!

TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_LONWOERD_000_024<tab>Some o' them Sisters have unholy appetites, so I'd best save a few bites for meself afore I take this inside... Ahem. You let J'nasshym know we're always here should her boss have need of us again.
TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_JNASSHYM_000_030<tab>You've delivered the package as I requested? Very good. I shall pass on the Sisters' sentiments to my superior.
TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_JNASSHYM_000_031<tab>...Hm? What manner of services do the Dutiful Sisters provide?

TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_JNASSHYM_000_032<tab>Continue your stay in Limsa Lominsa, and you'll likely find out soon enough. In fact, if you're confident in your abilities─and comfortable with the <var 1A 02 /var>unconventional<var 1A 01 /var>─you might wish to approach them yourself...

TEXT_SUBSEA016_00323_JNASSHYM_000_033<tab>I'm quite sure an adventurer of your stature has already glimpsed the truth behind the facade. For a business such as ours, their presence in the city is incredibly reassuring!
